ViewObject.Name: TopCustomerOsVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT ORG_DESC ORG_DESC, COA_NM COA_NM, ORG_ID ORG_ID, COA_ID COA_ID, OS_30_DAYS OS_30_DAYS, OS_60_DAYS OS_60_DAYS, OS_90_DAYS OS_90_DAYS, ap_amt_os amt_os, ap_amt_bs_org ar_amt_bs, 1 ap_sloc_id, cld_id gl_cld_id FROM (select cld_id, org_id, org_desc, coa_id, coa_nm, curr_id, curr_nm, sum(ap_amt_bs_org) ap_amt_bs_org, sum(ap_amt_sp_signed) ap_amt_sp, sum(ap_amt_adj_signed) ap_amt_adj, sum(ap_amt_os_signed) ap_amt_os, sum(os_30_days) os_30_days, sum(os_60_days) os_60_days, sum(os_90_days) os_90_days, sum(os_120_days) os_120_days, sum(os_180_days) os_180_days, sum(os_1_yr) os_1_yr, sum(os_greater_1_yr) os_greater_1_yr from (select a.gl_cld_id cld_id, a.ar_org_id org_id, b.org_desc, a.ar_coa_id coa_id, c.coa_nm, a.curr_id_sp curr_id, e.glbl_curr_desc curr_nm, a.ar_vou_id, a.ar_vou_dt, ap_amt_bs_org, a.ar_amt_sp, a.ap_amt_sp_signed, a.ap_amt_adj, a.ap_amt_adj_signed, ap_amt_os, ap_amt_os_signed, os_days, decode(sign(30 - os_days), -1, 0, ap_amt_os_signed) os_30_days, decode(sign(60 - os_days) * sign(os_days - 31), -1, 0, ap_amt_os_signed) os_60_days, decode(sign(90 - os_days) * sign(os_days - 61), -1, 0, ap_amt_os_signed) os_90_days, decode(sign(120 - os_days) * sign(os_days - 91), -1, 0, ap_amt_os_signed) os_120_days, decode(sign(180 - os_days) * sign(os_days - 121), -1, 0, ap_amt_os_signed) os_180_days, decode(sign(365 - os_days) * sign(os_days - 181), -1, 0, ap_amt_os_signed) os_1_yr, decode(sign(os_days - 366), -1, 0, ap_amt_os_signed) os_greater_1_yr from (select gl_cld_id, ar_org_id, ar_sloc_id, ar_coa_id, ar_curr_id_sp curr_id_sp, ar_vou_id, ar_vou_dt, ar_amt_sp, ar_amt_typ, gl_ho_org_id, decode(ar_amt_typ, 'Dr', nvl(ap.ar_amt_bs_orig, 0), 'Cr', -nvl(ar_amt_bs_orig, 0), nvl(ar_amt_bs_orig, 0)) ap_amt_bs_org, decode(ar_amt_typ, 'Dr', nvl(ap.ar_amt_sp, 0), 'Cr', -nvl(ar_amt_sp, 0), nvl(ar_amt_sp, 0)) ap_amt_sp_signed, nvl(ar_amt_adj, 0) ap_amt_adj, decode(ar_amt_typ, 'Dr', nvl(ar_amt_adj, 0), 'Cr', -nvl(ar_amt_adj, 0), nvl(ar_amt_adj, 0)) ap_amt_adj_signed, nvl(ar_amt_sp, 0) - nvl(ar_amt_adj, 0) ap_amt_os, decode(ar_amt_typ, 'Dr', nvl(ar_amt_sp, 0) - nvl(ar_amt_adj, 0), 'Cr', - (nvl(ar_amt_sp, 0) - nvl(ar_amt_adj, 0)), nvl(ar_amt_sp, 0) - nvl(ar_amt_adj, 0)) ap_amt_os_signed, trunc(sysdate) - decode('I','I',trunc(nvl(ar_ext_doc_dt,ar_vou_dt)),'V', ar_vou_dt,'D',trunc(nvl(ar_vou_due_dt,ar_vou_dt)),ar_vou_dt) os_days from ar ap where nvl(ar_amt_sp, 0) - nvl(ar_amt_adj, 0) > 0 -- and ap_txn_typ_adv = 'N' -- and ap_type_id in (8, 14) ) a, app.org b, fin$coa c, app.app$doc$txn d, app.app$glbl$curr e where a.os_days > 0 and not exists (select gl_Vou_id from gl where gl.gl_rev_flg in ('RVS','RVD') and gl_cld_id=a.GL_CLD_ID and gl_ho_org_id=a.GL_HO_ORG_ID and gl_org_id= a.Ar_ORG_ID and gl_vou_id=a.Ar_VOU_ID) and d.doc_cld_id = a.gl_cld_id and d.doc_org_id = a.ar_org_id and d.doc_sloc_id = a.ar_sloc_id and d.doc_txn_id = a.ar_vou_id and b.org_cld_id = a.gl_cld_id and b.org_id = a.ar_org_id and c.coa_cld_id = a.gl_cld_id and c.coa_sloc_id = a.ar_sloc_id and c.coa_ho_org_id = app.fn_get_parent_org_l0(a.gl_cld_id, a.ar_org_id) and c.coa_id = a.ar_coa_id --and AP_AMT_OS > '0' and e.glbl_curr_id = a.curr_id_sp
and ORG_ID = :BindOrgId
and a.gl_cld_id = :BindCldId ) group by cld_id, org_id, org_desc, coa_id, coa_nm, curr_id, curr_nm order by ap_amt_os desc ) WHERE ROWNUM<=5
